div.p: For the buildings [...] for 2000 bricks used for the walls which have been built, at the rate of 80 dr. for 10,000 bricks: 16 dr. to builders and their assistants: 8 dr. for mats used in plastering, 270 cubits at 3/4 ob.: 33 dr. 4 1/2 ob. for plastering at 4 dr. for 100 cubits: 11 dr. total: 68 dr. 4 1/2 ob. for the unfinished building (?) near the hay-loft: 2000 bricks (?) for those who dug the foundation and - - - for bricks used for the walls raised in height: 9960 bricks at a price for 10,000 bricks at 80 (dr.): 79 dr. 4 ob.
